attributes.action: Stop migrant boats from France landing in the UK by escorting back to france
attributes.additional_details: Ask the question to the French why they have not settled status in France and why they are allowing criminals to traffic people to risk lives crossing the channel
attributes.background: I would like parliament to try to get France to stop migrants crossing the channel or make it British law to safely escort them back to france

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
